description:
Ryūbi, with the help of Kan`u and her group, has quelled the rebellion, but there is more to Ryūbi that meets Kan`u eyes.  With his chance to make his claim to fame, Ryūbi abandons Touka and decides to focus on the fighting the rebels and tries to encourage Aisha to join him...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kan`u, Kokorozashi o Tsuranuku no Koto
関羽, 志を貫くのこと
